Agile Work ( Kanban/Scrum ).Description: Planning and organising work using agile methods

Exploratory Testing.Description: Manually exploring the edges to find new tests to automate

Continuous Integration.Description: Automatically integrate code from all sources, build and run ready for test

Continuous Delivery.Description: Automatically build latest integrated code, prepare ready to run in production

Continuous Deployment.Description: Deploy the latest build to production automatically
